description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、第十三届全国人民代表大会山东省代表、中国共产党党员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, a deputy from Shandong Province to the 13th National People's Congress, and a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个民族，是中国的主体民族。
description.en: An East Asian ethnic group and nation, who constitute the majority population of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia, led by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关，任期自2018年至2023年。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, serving from 2018 to 2023.
Li Feng is from Zibo, Shandong.
Li Feng is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 李峰是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Feng is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，李峰被选为山东省出席第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: In 2018, Li Feng was elected as a deputy representing Shandong Province to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 淄博市是山东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: Zibo is a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Shandong Province.
